name: The Path (itch) (Adventuron)
description:
The Path

Encounter a series of challenges in this illustrated text-based puzzle game. 

INSTRUCTIONS

  1. The game uses keyboard input.
  2. Type DROP <<ItemName>> to make the initial sacrifice.
  3. Type I or INVENTORY to list the articles of sacrifice.

DISCLAIMER

The path is a fantasy game. Particular actions that work in a fantasy context may be dangerous if attempted in real-life. 

CREDITS

  • Game Design / Programming : @LearnAdventuron
  • Title Screen : Robin Grenville Evans
  • Artwork : @Rail_slave
  • Fonts Used: Lato by tyPoland Lukasz Dziedzic & Clairsys by Paul van der Laan
